content: 100 Naked Words — Day 87 It’s Time Reflections, Ripples and Ramblings of a Restless Mind Photo Credit — Me! Lido di Camaiore, Tuscany Time to let my hair down, hang loose, chillax, take it easy, switch off. Yes, it’s time for a breather, a metaphorical extended cuppa, to down tools and have some down time. I walked out of the office with spring in the air and a spring in my step. The happy knowledge that for the next week or so, it’s all about family, all about enjoying time with my (not so) little ones, to joke and play and surround ourselves with fun and laughter. Time to read and learn and maybe even have a glass of wine or two. Yep, time to have some time off. High time. About me: Citizen of the World. I love writing, photography, travelling, reading, learning and growing. Medium is another journey in my life, let’s see what sights we may see.
